description:
NOTE: THIS IS THE MAC VERSION OF THE COURSE. THE EDITING MODULE COVERS SOFTWARE EXCLUSIVE TO APPLE COMPUTERS. PC VERSION COMING SOON!

This course was designed to help you find your "marketing voice" so you can connect with your viewers in a meaningful way. Together we will go through scripting videos that speak your viewer's language - so you can create instant rapport, trust and be seen as an expert. You will also learn how to create professional looking videos, so you can save the cost of hiring big production companies while you're growing your business. You'll also learn the "how to" of video editing as well as the principles of the edit, so you can edit on any platform. And lastly, we're going to go through the ways you can get your videos in front of people, so you can start building your loyal following and create raving fans for your business or brand!
title: How To Make Video So You Can Dominate Branding Online! (Mac)
